text: Rory's Place is an American children's television series produced by Johnny Devon. The series premiered on Ready Set Learn as part of the TLC programming block on September 27, 1997 and ended on January 23, 1999. The series premiered on Ready Set Learn as part of the TLC programming block on September 27, 1997 and ended on January 23, 1999. ==Characters== * Rory, a flamingo * Manna, an emu ==Episodes== Season Episodes Originally aired Season premiere Season finale 1 26 Category:1997 American television series debuts Category:1999 American television series endings Category:1990s American animated television series Category:American children's television series
